title: Alex Murdaugh pleads not guilty to federal wire fraud and money laundering charges
description: Alex Murdaugh has been arraigned on federal money laundering and wire fraud charges for indictments saying he stole money from his clients

title: Jury finds Danny Masterson guilty on 2 counts in rape retrial
description: Danny Masterson had pleaded not guilty to three counts of felony rape following accusations by three different women, including a former girlfriend.

title: Veteran character actor John Beasley dies at 79
description: John Beasley, the veteran character actor who played a kindly school bus driver on the TV drama “Everwood” and appeared in dozens of films dating back to the 1980s, has died

title: WATCH:  Projectile narrowly missed car in Kyiv
description: Dramatic dash camera footage shows a projectile falling from the sky in Kyiv and crashing into a busy roadway, narrowly missing a moving car.

title: Lawyer arrested in over decade-old rapes after being identified by genetic genealogy
description: Matthew J. Nilo has been arrested in connection with several Boston sexual assaults in 2007 and 2008. Officials were able to identify him using genetic genealogy.

title: Justice Department should investigate beatings at Georgia jail, attorney says
description: A civil rights attorney and a local NAACP president are calling for the U.S. Justice Department to investigate what they're calling the systemic abuse of detainees at a county jail in Georgia

title: WATCH:  NYC program pairs students and therapy dogs to encourage reading
description: R.E.A.D instruction team, Nancy George-Michalson, Michelle Sarao and her dog Cooper join “GMA3” to discuss the success of the program and how students have responded.

title: WATCH:  Tianyu Arts & Culture shines bright with their Chinese lantern festivals worldwide
description: The largest Chinese lantern festival producer in North America preserve the traditional art of lantern making while embracing technological advances.

title: Car sent flying over tow truck in Georgia, video shows
description: It looks like a scene from a Hollywood blockbuster

title: Texas governor appoints John Scott as interim attorney general after Paxton impeached
description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott has named John Scott to temporarily serve as the state’s attorney general

title: Mike Pence announcing 2024 presidential bid next week in Iowa: Source
description: Mike Pence will announce on June 7 that he is running for president, launching with a kickoff speech and campaign video ahead of a town hall with CNN in Des Moines, Iowa

title: Limo operator sentenced to 5 to 15 years in crash that killed 20 people
description: Nauman Hussain was sentenced to five to 15 years for manslaughter in a 2018 limousine crash in upstate New York that left 20 people dead.

title: Nearly 2,000 Amazon workers to walk out after return to office
description: 'Employees need a say in decisions that affect our lives,' an Amazon worker petition said.

title: Convicted killer calls police and admits to murdering 2 more people
description: A Texas man is facing two murder charges after he allegedly called police to confess to killing his roommate.

title: Teen sentenced to 80 years for killing mother, sister
description: A 16-year-old West Virginia boy has been sentenced to consecutive 40-year prison terms in the fatal shootings of his mother and sister

title: WATCH:  Tiger quintuplets make public debut at Chinese zoo
description: Curious tiger cubs making their public debut and exploring grass for the first time is the cutest thing you'll see all day.

title: Oklahoma high court strikes down 2 abortion bans
description: The Oklahoma Supreme Court has ruled two state laws banning abortion are unconstitutional, but the procedure remains illegal in the state in most cases

title: Body of Missouri ER doctor found across Arkansas state line, brother says
description: Authorities have told the family of Dr. John Forsyth, a missing emergency room physician from Missouri, that his body was found in Arkansas

title: House to vote on debt ceiling deal as lawmakers race to prevent default
description: The vote will be a major test for Speaker Kevin McCarthy, who faces a potential revolt from GOP hard-liners if he fails to get a majority of Republicans to back the bill.

title: Earth is 'quite sick' and in danger zone in nearly all ecological ways, study says
description: A new study says Earth has pushed past seven out of eight scientifically established safety limits and into “the danger zone,” not just for an overheating planet that’s losing its natural areas, but for well-being of people living on it

title: Priceless painting looted by Nazis during World War II returns to Poland from Japan
description: Authorities in Poland say that a priceless 16th century Italian painting that was looted by Nazi Germany during World War II has been found in Japan and returned

title: Chris Christie to announce 2024 presidential bid: Sources
description: Chris Christie, a former two-term New Jersey governor, will be announcing another run for president.

title: Twitter may be worth one-third what Musk paid for it last fall as Fidelity marks down investment
description: Twitter may now be worth one-third of what Elon Musk paid for the social media platform just seven months ago

title: WATCH:  Baseball fan catches foul ball bare-handed
description: The Milwaukee Brewers were playing the Toronto Blue Jays when a foul ball went into the stands and a man made the incredible catch without even standing up.

title: Auschwitz museum criticizes use of death camp in politics after ruling party uses it in political ad
description: The Auschwitz-Birkenau memorial museum has denounced a political spot by Poland’s ruling party that uses the theme of the Nazi German extermination camp to discourage participation in an upcoming anti-government march

title: Sweden close to becoming 1st 'smoke free' European country as daily use dwindles
description: Summer is in the air, cigarette smoke is not, in Sweden's outdoor bars and restaurants

title: German court hands woman lengthy prison sentence for attacks on neo-Nazis
description: A court in eastern Germany has sentenced a 28-year-old woman to five years and three months in prison for taking part in a series of attacks on neo-Nazis and other right-wing extremists over a period of two years

title: Germany orders closure of four out of five Russian consulates in tit-for-tat move
description: Germany says it has told Russia to close four out of five consulates in Germany in a tit-for-tat move after Moscow set a limit for the number of German embassy staff and related bodies that can operate in Russia

title: Talks between Sudan's warring sides fall apart
description: Negotiations between Sudan's warring parties fell apart Wednesday as both sides accused each other of cease-fire violations.

title: Former NYPD officer, others to stand trial for stalking on behalf of China
description: A retired NYPD sergeant and two purported Chinese agents used an elderly father as bait in an alleged plot, according to prosecutors.

title: Young couple shot dead by their landlord over alleged tenant dispute, police say
description: A young couple who were living together have been shot dead by their landlord following a dispute with the man who was 30 years their elder, police say.

title: Latvia's Parliament elects new head of state from 3 candidates in unpredictable vote
description: Latvian lawmakers are set to elect new head of state on Wednesday from a field of three candidates with no clear favorite

title: Olympic sports leaders meet amid uncertainty over Russians competing at 2024 games
description: Olympic sports bodies are meeting amid ongoing uncertainty about if and how Russian athletes could return to their competitions ahead of the 2024 Paris Games

title: Brothers behind dramatic rescues in Kenya
description: Roan and Taru Carr-Hartley are members of the third generation running Sheldrick Wildlife Trust, a Kenyan conservation organization.

title: North Korea admits failed satellite launch
description: North Korea acknowledged on Wednesday its failure to launch a military reconnaissance satellite.

title: US Border Patrol chief to retire following end of Title 42 restrictions at border
description: The head of the U.S. Border Patrol announced Tuesday that he was retiring, after seeing through a major policy shift that seeks to clamp down on illegal crossings at the U.S.-Mexico border following the end of Title 42 pandemic restrictions

title: WATCH:  Swiss cow with a broken leg airlifted to safety
description: A helicopter crew rescued a cow, named Goddess, from a Swiss hillside after the animal broke its leg.
